nodes.text: The CR-17 Incendia was a podracer built by Czerka Corporation during the time of the Cold War. During the Galactic Civil War, the third model of the vehicle was released. The Zalpertine Cup was a Podracing series on Korrilan IV that strictly catered to the Incendia model racer.

The CR-17 Incendia Podracers were extremely fast, while incorporating safety features and cosmetic modifications. While other Podracers were built to demonstrate advanced technology or trick fabrication, the CR-17s were better used to demonstrate piloting skill.
The CR-17 Incendia was first introduced in Star Wars: The Old Republic in update 1.6.3 and available to purchase in the Cartel Market.
